result.execSummary:
The defendant Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Pay a forfeiture in the amount of $100.00 including costs. In the alternative of paying the forfeiture, Court ordered the defendant to serve 10 days in HOC, with credit for 10 days served.

$1399.93 payable to Best Buy, JOINT AND SEVERAL with defendant in case 15CM1085. Court ordered defendant to pay the restitution at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 11-01-15 or, if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez in court with attorney Olya Petukhova.  Defendant Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez in custody.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense counsel waived the appearance of an interpreter for this hearing.  Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended RETAIL THEFT, 63.043, a municipal citation.  The defendant entered a guilty plea.   Court found the defendant guilty and ordered a forfeiture in the amount of $100.00 including costs.  In the alternative of paying the forfeiture, Court ordered the defendant to serve 10 days in the House of Correction with credit for 10 days served.  Court ordered the defendant to pay restitution in the amount of $1399.93 to Best Buy, joint and several with defendant in case 15CM001085.  Court ordered the defendant to pay the restitution at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 11-01-2015 or, if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.

Attorney Olya Petukhova in court, defendant Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez not in court, in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense counsel waives the appearance of the defendant for this hearing only.  Final pretrial held.  Case remains calendared for jury trial on October 5, 2015 at 8:30 am in Branch 24

Attorney Olya Petukhova in court, defendant Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez not in court, in custody.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 47. lr  Jury trial scheduled for 10-05-2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Olya Petukhova in court, defendant Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez not in court, in custody.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  The State's file is not in court.  Court grants defense motion for an adjournment.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 24.  Status conference scheduled for June 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez in court with attorney Olya Petukhova.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter Brenda Bartholomew.  Parties request another pretrial date.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez
Current: 10615 Beechnut Street, Houston, TX 77072 United States  (Effective: 04-06-2015)
Prior: 10675 Buchnal Street, Houston, WI 77072

Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with: Best Buy Stores

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.

Defendant Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Defendant Jorge Luis Palominos-Fernandez in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Spanish Interpreter: Vicki Bermudez

Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
